title: Historic South Austin Home - Available Now!
posting_body: Incredible opportunity to lease a cool vintage home in the heart of Bouldin Creek.
Dating back to 1860, the home was originally constructed from two dog-run cabins on a ranch southeast of Waco.
Home has been maintained and modernized with utmost care combining the old world charm with modern living.
Soaring ceilings and big rooms, ideal for entertaining.
Large kitchen with cook's gas range.
Original cypress walls & ceilings, pine floors & fantastic cabinetry throughout.
Downstairs: flexible floor plan with 3 rooms, full bath, formal dining, powder room, kitchen, utility room, and breakfast area.
Upstairs: primary suite, secondary bedrooms, and a full guest bath.
Outside: numerous outdoor porches, balconies, retreats along with the inground pool make this the ultimate 78704 hideaway!
Walk to all of the Bouldin hot spots including Elizabeth Street Cafe Thai Fresh, Bouldin Creek Cafe, Sway, and more.
Refrigerator, washer, dryer included in lease.
The owner pays for landscaping and pool maintenance.
Text Seth for more information or to schedule a showing!
Listing by Compass RE Texas LLC
